bombs.description: normal bombs never expire costs 10 tickets for one and damage 17.50 hp

ice_bombs.description: costs 15 tickets for one, do 0.25% less damage than normal bombs but have a chance to freeze opponent

sticky_bombs.description: costs 15 tickets for one, stick when touch anywhere and do normal bomb damage

auto_aim_bombs.description: costs 25 tickets for one, automatically aims to the target

boxing_gloves.description: costs 20 tickets for one, only one can be used at a time, adds 50% more damage to punches
